testcase.name: Successfully deleting an employee
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the "PIM" module....................................passed And User enters the employee name in the search field.......................passed Then User clicks the "Search" button........................................passed Given User selects the employee from the search results.....................passed And User clicks the "Delete" button and confirms the deletion...............passed Then User should no longer see the employee profile in the search results...passed
